name: Drake Corsair
description:
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Focus: Exploration
Heed the call of uncharted space and harness the spirit of exploration with the Drake Corsair, a worthy companion, supporting you in battle, discovery, and delivery, wherever the winds of adventure may steer you.
description_cn:
制造商：德雷克星际（Drake Interplanetary）
定位：探索
听，未知深空正在呼唤着您！用德雷克海盗船来驾驭您那不羁的探索精神吧。无论冒险之风将您吹向何处，它都将在战斗，发现，递送等领域作为一个值得信赖的伙伴来助您一臂之力。

shop_rent.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-微科星(microTech)-新巴贝奇(New Babbage)-BestInShow_Kiosk
